channel.title: NPC Name, and examine info
channel.description:
Not too sure if this is a client or server thing, but for some reason my cows are named "Green Dragon (Level-9999) and the examine info is "Wowza!"
Any ideas on how to fix this?

item.title: NPC Name, and examine info
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:9, topic:309706”][quote author=lorenso link=topic=406151.msg3001822#msg3001822 date=1256065309]
In Class5.java u will see this: anInt56 = (anInt56 + 1) % 20; Class5 class5 = aClass5Array80[anInt56] = new Class5(); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[i]; class5.aLong78 = i; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); if(i == 81){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.aString65 = "Green Dragon @gre@(level-9999)"; class5.aByteArray89 = "Wowzas!".getBytes(); }
Replace that with:

anInt56 = (anInt56 + 1) % 20; Class5 class5 = aClass5Array80[anInt56] = new Class5(); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[i]; class5.aLong78 = i; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); if(i == 81){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.aString65 = "Cow"; class5.aByteArray89 = "Free cowhides for me".getBytes(); }
[/quote]

You don’t even need to replace it. You just need to delete the shit that was in there.[/quote]
Your right actually. Why didn’t i think of that before… Hmmmm.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Name, and examine info

Replace that with:

anInt56 = (anInt56 + 1) % 20; Class5 class5 = aClass5Array80[anInt56] = new Class5(); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[i]; class5.aLong78 = i; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); if(i == 81){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.aString65 = "Cow"; class5.aByteArray89 = "Free cowhides for me".getBytes(); }[/quote]

You don’t even need to replace it. You just need to delete the shit that was in there.
